title: Ticket #2215: IPv6 testing
description:
We need IPv6 routable machines to test IPv6 stage 3. The CSL network does not route IPv6 at all. Options:

  • Tunnel. Options include SixXS, Hurricane Electric IPv6 Tunnel Broker
  • Virtual machines
remarks:
2015-May-27 15:24:14 by tlmiller:
See ticket #4702. Also, the BaTLab has IPv6 to/from/in-DNS one of its nodes, and we're running mixed-mode tests on it(s platform) every autobuild.
creator: adesmet
